body: 去掉COLUMNS关键字，后面直接跟字段是可以的，但是有个bug，就是配置字段映射后，mysql源表新增字段同步任务就出错了

I cannot ping container success, with community's help, I pull a mysql client and connect sucess
https://hub.docker.com/_/mysql
The reason maybe docker network setting, default bridge, but two container is in the same network default, so the mysql container connect 9030 port success
done
In terms of ```Spark Load```, fe-common would be packaged into a ```spark-dpp.jar```  and upload to Spark when submit job, So move some Class to fe-common should not affect ```Spark Load```.

> In terms of `Spark Load`, fe-common would be packaged into a `spark-dpp.jar` and upload to Spark when submit job, So move some Class to fe-common should not affect `Spark Load`.

Ok, thanks for your confirm

Hi @Henry2SS , could you please update the `sql-block.md` document to explain this. Maybe:

```
支持按用户配置SQL黑名单，通过正则匹配的方式拒绝指定SQL。
该功能仅用于限制查询语句，并且不会限制 explain 语句的执行。
```

both Chinese and English

> 支持按用户配置SQL黑名单，通过正则匹配的方式拒绝指定SQL。

> ```
>

It is explained in another PR #7403. And I would like to add some unit-tests to test that sql block doesn't block ALTER/DROP operations.

Anyway, I will update docs in this PR first.

I tested in 0.15:

```
create table tbl1(k1 string, k2 string) distributed by hash(k1) buckets 1;
insert into tbl1 values("6,2,8,2", "5,7,2,8");
```

The result is as expected:
```
mysql> select regexp_replace(k1, ",", "\n") col1, regexp_replace(k2, ",", "\n") col2 from tbl1\G
*************************** 1. row ***************************
col1: 6
2
8
2
col2: 5
7
2
8
1 row in set (0.02 sec)
```
You can write `Fix #7410` in your PR comment. So the the issue 7410 will be closed automatically when the PR is merged.
Did you met some problem about it?

The txn in state COMMITTED must be change to VISIBLE.
It looks like there is some thing wrong with your publish task execution.
See Master FE's fe.log to find some errors about "publish".
@WindyGao yes
after upgrade to doris 0.15 the problem was gone.

> No unit test to cover this case?

added ut
